item.title: 美国 CPI 助推美联储减息预期，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在美国通胀数据与预期相符，令市场猜测美联储将在 9 月份有降息空间之后，亚洲股市将追随华尔街走高。【原文：Stocks in Asia were set to track Wall Street higher after an in-line US inflation reading bolstered speculation the Federal Reserve will have room to cut rates in September.】

item.title: 腾讯投资者关注廉价股票估值创新高之路
item.description: 随着全球科技巨头股价屡创新高，投资者看到了腾讯控股有限公司股价最终重现昔日辉煌的机会。【原文：As tech megacaps around the world climb to new records, investors see a chance for Tencent Holdings Ltd. shares to finally regain their former glory.】

item.title: 泰国将在新领导上任前的最后一次会议上降低利率
item.description: 泰国央行预计将在即将卸任的行长塞萨布-素提瓦特那鲁普（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）领导的最后一次会议上下调关键利率，因为决策者希望保护经济免受美国关税和通货紧缩风险的影响。【原文：The Bank of Thailand is expected to cut its key rate at the last meeting to be led by outgoing Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput, as policymakers look to shield the economy from the risks of US tariffs and deflation.】

item.title: 法拉贝拉第二季度利润因零售业务强劲而增长
item.description: Falabella SA 公司第二季度的利润增幅超过预期，原因是智利整个经济的零售销售依然强劲，尽管其他指标显示经济扩张更加低迷。【原文：Falabella SA’s second-quarter profit rose more than expected as retail sales across the economy in Chile remain robust, even as other indicators show more subdued expansion.】

item.title: 公司和持有人发售股票后 Circle 下跌
item.description: Circle Internet Group Inc.股价下跌，此前这家第二大稳定币发行商和包括联合创始人兼首席执行官杰里米-阿莱尔（Jeremy Allaire）在内的一批股东宣布发售合计1000万股股票。【原文：Shares of Circle Internet Group Inc. fell after the second-largest stablecoin issuer and a group of shareholders including co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Jeremy Allaire announced an offering to sell 10 million shares combined.】

item.title: 戈卢布牵头为害虫控制公司 Greenix 提供 3 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Golub Capital 主导了一笔约 3 亿美元的私人信用贷款，以支持私募股权公司 Gridiron Capital 收购害虫控制公司 Greenix。【原文：Golub Capital led a private credit loan of around $300 million to support private equity firm Gridiron Capital’s purchase of pest control company Greenix, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.description: 一份基本良好的美国通胀报告为押注美联储将很快降息的交易商提供了支持，一些交易商认为大幅降息的可能性增大。【原文：A largely benign US inflation report is bolstering the case for traders betting that the Federal Reserve will soon cut interest rates, with some seeing an increased possibility of an outsize reduction.】

item.title: Bloom Energy 预计将与数据中心达成更多供电协议
item.description: Bloom Energy Corp. 首席执行官 KR Sridhar 表示，在达成为甲骨文公司人工智能设施提供电力的协议后，该公司正在与其他大型数据中心开发商进行谈判。【原文：Bloom Energy Corp.’s Chief Executive Officer KR Sridhar said the company is in talks with other major data-center developers following a deal to provide power to Oracle’s AI facilities.】

item.title: Cava 下调销售额预期，原因是用餐者态度谨慎，酒吧业务高速增长
item.description: 卡瓦集团公司（Cava Group Inc.）在第二季度销售额大幅下滑后下调了全年销售额展望，原因是食客们在餐厅用餐上的消费减少，这表明该品牌在保持近年来的快速增长方面正面临着压力。【原文：Cava Group Inc. trimmed its annual sales outlook after a sharp deceleration in the second quarter as skittish diners spent less on restaurant meals, showing the pressure the brand is facing to keep up with its speedy growth in recent years.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉拒绝埃克森公司在争议地区开展业务

item.description: 德克萨斯州巴尼特页岩盆地最大的天然气生产商 BKV 公司预计，随着液化天然气出口终端的投产，2026 年的天然气需求将十分强劲，从而推动燃料价格上涨。【原文：BKV Corp., the largest natural gas producer in Texas’ Barnett shale basin, expects strong gas demand in 2026 as liquefied natural gas export terminals come online, driving up prices for the fuel.】

item.title: 美国七月关税收入增长未能阻止预算赤字扩大
item.description: 美国 7 月份的关税收入创下新的月度纪录，但这一增长并不足以阻止月度预算赤字的扩大；这表明联邦政府面临着持续的财政挑战。【原文：US tariff revenue reached a fresh monthly record in July, though the increase wasn’t enough to prevent a widening in the monthly budget deficit — pointing to the federal government’s continuing fiscal challenges.】

item.title: 美国国务院人权报告抨击巴西和南非
item.description: 美国国务院的年度人权报告抨击了巴西和南非，同时减少了对以色列和萨尔瓦多的批评，改变了对其他国家侵权行为的描述，以符合唐纳德-特朗普总统的优先事项。【原文：The State Department’s annual human rights report called out Brazil and South Africa while scaling back criticism of Israel and El Salvador, shifting its account of other nations’ abuses to align with President Donald Trump’s priorities.】

item.title: 印度首家人工智能独角兽公司 Fractal 申请 5.6 亿美元 IPO
item.description: 人工智能和分析服务提供商 Fractal Analytics 在孟买申请首次公开募股，公司估值可能超过 35 亿美元。【原文：Fractal Analytics, a provider of artificial intelligence and analytics services, filed for an initial public offering in Mumbai that could value the company at more than $3.5 billion.】

item.title: 纽约 MTA 因拥堵收费和州政府增税而获得 S&P 升级
item.description: 大都会运输局 171 亿美元的债务由票箱和通行费收入偿还，S&P 全球评级公司将大都会运输局的评级从 A- 提升一级至 A，部分原因是该机构成功推出了拥堵收费。【原文：The Metropolitan Transportation Authority’s $17.1 billion of debt that’s repaid with farebox and toll revenue was boosted one notch to A from A- by S&P Global Ratings in part thanks to the agency’s successful congestion pricing rollout.】

item.title: 2026 年美国石油产出展望因价格下跌而持续下降
item.description: 2026 年，美国的石油产量将比之前估计的还要少，因为较低的价格使得产量从今年创纪录的水平上有所下降。【原文：The US is going to pump even less oil in 2026 than previously estimated, as lower prices sends production down from this year’s record levels.】

item.title: 德尔蒙特调整拍卖规则以吸引对食品罐头厂的竞标
item.description: 破产的水果罐头公司德尔蒙蒂食品公司（Del Monte Foods）在给予潜在竞标者更多的出价时间后，赢得了法院举行资产拍卖的许可。【原文：Bankrupt canned fruit company Del Monte Foods won court permission to hold an auction of its assets after giving potential bidders more time to make an offer.】

item.title: TPG 和 QIA 领导的集团将以 14 亿美元的交易价格将康吉私有化
item.description: 由 TPG 公司和卡塔尔投资局牵头的财团提出收购在香港上市的康芝药业控股有限公司，该交易对这家中国医疗器械制造商的估值约为 112 亿港元（14 亿美元）。【原文：A consortium led by TPG Inc. and the Qatar Investment Authority has offered to buy out Hong Kong-listed Kangji Medical Holdings Ltd. in a deal that values the Chinese medical device maker at about HK$11.2 billion ($1.4 billion).】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席皮尔斯称市场将选出代币化的赢家
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）成员海丝特-皮尔斯（Hester Peirce）周二表示，市场力量将最终证明哪种证券和其他现实世界资产的代币化形式会胜出。【原文：Market forces will ultimately prove which forms of tokenizing securities and other real-world assets will win out, Securities and Exchange Commission member Hester Peirce said Tuesday.】
